channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Gap x Loewe, Hermès x Adidas: Experts spill their dream collabs for 2026
item.description: Fashion collaborations are nothing new, but 2025 felt like a year particularly stuffed with branding matchups. There’s a reason why this might be happ...

item.title: This Is What Kevin O’Leary Would Do If He Were Broke
item.description: It’s the side hustle of the moment.

item.title: How Do I Manage A Personality Conflict On My Team?
item.description: Nothing I’ve tried so far has worked.

item.title: ‘Largest LBO in history’: Warner rejects Paramount again, scoffing at $87 billion worth of debt in its $108 billion bid
item.description: Warner continues to stick with Netflix, the shock winner that emerged in early December from the auction begun by Paramount.

item.title: How to find a job in the age of AI

item.title: Upskilling Isn’t Just Training—It’s a Growth Strategy
item.description: From greater retention to higher productivity, think beyond your employees’ current skills.

item.title: LinkedIn is expanding its AI-powered job search features
item.description: LinkedIn’s AI -powered job search feature is expanding to new audiences. The tool—which lets job seekers find relevant open positions without needing ...

item.title: Nvidia and Siemens reveal fusion energy partnership at CES 2026
item.description: Crowds flooded the freshly opened showroom floors on Day 2 of the CES and were met by thousands of robots , AI companions, assistants, health longevit...

item.title: ‘We do pranks and stuff like that’: Craigslist ad that sought 20 child actors for Minnesota daycare centers taken down after fueling fake news
item.description: Screenshots of the ad were used in social media posts on multiple platforms, cited as proof of fraud at Minnesota day care centers.

item.title: The Education Department is garnishing wages for millions of student loan borrowers in default. Who is affected and how much they can take
item.description: Wage garnishment "is a scary concept since they can take 15% of after-tax income," Ashley Morgan, debt and bankruptcy attorney and owner of Ashley F. ...

item.title: Minnesota fraud scandal gives Trump cover to withhold funding for kids in 5 Democratic-led states
item.description: Five states — California, Colorado, Illinois, Minnesota and New York — are targeted, and the HHS said they had been notified.

item.title: Science Say 2 Hours a Week of This Activity Slows Brain Aging Up to 20 Percent
item.description: Scientists crunched 20 years of data on 30,000 older adults and discovered a surprising action that helps your brain stay younger.

item.title: Amazon Prime lawsuit settlement: Eligibility guidelines, refund amounts, and how to file a claim
item.description: If you signed up for an Amazon Prime membership between June 23, 2019, and June 23, 2025, Amazon might owe you as much as $51. This comes after the on...

item.title: 2026: A View from the Middle of the Chemical Industry
item.description: Watch these four shifts to prepare for the transitions ahead, not just respond to them.

item.title: Exclusive: Fireblocks acquires crypto accounting platform TRES Finance for $130 million
item.description: This is the crypto infrastructure firm’s second acquisition over the past year.
